title: Add protocol renumbering reference mapping and validation plan
body:
## Summary
- document the existing protocol handoffs, numbering references, and dependency chain analysis for the renumbering effort
- provide a comprehensive renumbering execution prompt covering mappings, file-by-file actions, artifact paths, and validation checks
- capture validation script guidance and a risk assessment to support safe protocol realignment

## Testing
- not run
